title: We are looking for developers!
description: We are currently facing a shortage of web developers, which has hindered the timely realization of our roadmap. We are therefore seeking skilled individuals who are proficient in Svelte and JS and possess a strong grasp of transforming design concepts into HTML and CSS.

title: Do not be afraid to contribute!
description: We are open for every pull request!
